name: Lost Mines of Phandelver
description: A classic D&D 5e starter adventure. The party has been hired by Gundren Rockseeker to escort a wagon of supplies to Phandalin. Along the way, they discover Gundren and his escort have been ambushed by goblins.
notes: Starting adventure for new players. Focus on exploration and roleplay.

history.description: Beginning of Adventure - On the Triboar Trail
history.narrative:
You find yourselves on the Triboar Trail, a well-traveled road that runs from Neverwinter to the mining town of Phandalin. The sun is high overhead, and the journey has been uneventful so far. Gundren Rockseeker, a dwarf prospector, hired you to escort a wagon of supplies to Phandalin. He rode ahead with his escort, Sildar Hallwinter, promising to meet you in Phandalin.

As you round a bend in the trail, you come upon a disturbing sight: two dead horses blocking the path, black-feathered arrows protruding from their bodies. The horses belong to Gundren and Sildar.

What do you do?
